meanings.definition: A system of notation for recording and analyzing human movement.
meanings.sent1: Studying labanotation helps us understand how people move.
meanings.sent2: Dancers use labanotation to write down their choreography.
meanings.sent3: The labanotation symbols danced off the page and onto the floor!
meanings.sent4: Her graceful movements were like a beautiful dance written in labanotation.
meanings.sent5: Labanotation is like a secret language that reveals the art of motion.

meanings.definition: The act of using labanotation to document dance movements.
meanings.sent1: Her labanotation of the dance routine was precise and detailed.
meanings.sent2: The labanotation workshop focused on capturing every step accurately.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally spilled coffee on his labanotation, creating a new dance move!
meanings.sent4: Labanotation turned the fluidity of dance into structured symbols.
meanings.sent5: The labanotation process transformed the dance into a written masterpiece.
